categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ssusk Uru was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. By 3643 BBY, Uru was serving as a battle instructor for Republic troopers on Sennatt when the Jedi was infected with a plague by the Sith Lord Vivicar. However, Uru was freed when Vivicar was defeated.

Ssusk Uru was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Consular players after end of Act I if they chose to allow Terrak Morrhage to kill the Jedi Masters connected to him.
